name: Birdo vs. Macintosh
summary: Join BIRDO on a quest unlike any other: a mission to stop the evil Steve Jobs from sullying the good name of Windows 95 (and the soon to be released Windows 98) using a smear campaign that goes far and wide across the vast landscapes of Silicon Valley. It's up to you, a lowly pink Birdo named "Birdo", to stop the antics of the recently reestablished CEO before things are too late in Computer Land, 1997.
